original_body_lines: The Examinations Department today said that the 2022 G.C.E. Ordinary Level (O/L) Examinations is to be postponed further.
Accordingly, they said that the exams which were scheduled to begin on May 15 cannot be held on the said date.
As such, it has been suggested to hold the examinations on May 29 until June 8.
Previously, the 2022 G.C.E. O/L examination was postponed due to the protests carried out by teachers against the government and its tax policies. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
